Use True Start Locations for Civs
Real Start Locations
Civilizations will start in historically accurate locations.
This map does not yet support True Start Locations, please disable this option.
Real Resource Placement
Resources will start in historically accurate locations.
This map does not yet support True Resource Locations, please disable this option.
CCTP Compatible Map
Randomly Generated Map Scripts
Play Community Call To Power using one of the randomly generated map scripts.
Community Call to Power Map Pack
Community Call to Power Mod compatible maps, including TSL Earth maps.

Legendary Earth Mod I
Legendary Earth Mod II
Legendary Earth Mod - FFA
A Huge Earth Map, this version allows for all civs. Map Maker: Seraphim
A Huge Earth Map, this version limits the available civs to Ancient Era ones only, eg. You cannot play as America here. Map Maker: Seraphim
A Huge Earth Map, this version limits the available civs to Modern Era ones only, eg. You cannot play as Egypt here. Map Maker: Seraphim
A Huge Earth Map, this version chooses random civs. Map Maker: Seraphim

One of Civilization V's most popular Earth maps returns for the Gods & Kings Expansion! Accruing nearly 50,000 downloads, the original version for vanilla Civilization V was widely popular and often credited as being one of the most accurate Earth maps while still maintaining the importance of gameplay balance. Map Maker: Dark_Jedi06
Same as LEM I but with a different selection of civs to choose from. Map Maker: Dark_Jedi06
Same as LEM I but you can choose from all civilizations. Map Maker: Dark_Jedi06

War Lord
You killed all who stood against you, only nobody knows!
You are considered more than just a man, you are a God.
God himself has placed you in power to lead your people.
You are a restless spirit, you are driven by an urge to move and know what lies over that hill.
People tell me I am dumb... maybe... maybe. But I am yet to meet person who can outrun bullet.
